question: Retrieve the names of employees who work with more than one project.
mysql_example: SELECT e.first_name, e.last_name FROM employees e JOIN employee_projects ep ON e.id = ep.employee_id GROUP BY e.id HAVING COUNT(ep.project_id) > 1;
sqlite_example: SELECT e.first_name, e.last_name FROM employees e JOIN employee_projects ep ON e.id = ep.employee_id GROUP BY e.id HAVING COUNT(ep.project_id) > 1;
